attributes.action: Stop charging Wrongly Imprisoned Persons for Staying in Prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it is absolutely scandalous that a person who is wrongly imprisoned as a result of a miscarriage of justice has to pay for their stay in prison while true criminals are given a free stay on the taxpayer. These people should be entitled to massive compensation, a public apology and no charges to clear their name.
